review: One of the best (and most cost-effective) investments, ever!! I've read the complaints but on my Windows 8 laptop this thing works way better than I anticipated. I have a friend with an older Mac who said it didn't work... so that's probably why it didn't work.
author: Rick

review: We don't really use it much. I think it is pretty neat but 2 of our TVs have a casting functionality built into them.
author: Gary

review: I already own one chromecast but had to buy another one since my mom LOVED mine!I love the casting ability it's so very helpful when I'm trying to watch Youtube videos or share my laptop screen with guests.I don't get to use my chromecast too often since I usually use Hulu+ and Netflix through my XboxOne..But I love it!
author: Kendra Castaneda

review: As advertised,  nice product.  No sure I can really add much the other reviews have covered. Convenient to cast from my tablet and phone,  my kids had Chromecast on their iPhones and seems to work flawlessly for them as well.
author: Jimmer55

review: And at 29 bucks, it's an easy decision to make. Extremely happy with my Chromecast!The SDK Google realeased is only ensuring more and more apps are Chromecast ready on a constant basis.
author: Fernando Sabatino

review: I thought it would simply copy my laptop to the TV.Instead, it uses the wireless from my laptop through the routerand out to chrome.  This is incredibly poor use of wireless bandwidth.Further, it does not simply copy the screen.  You have to download appsto make it work with specific programs.I returned it and got an HDMI cable instead.
author: Peter

review: This product only seems to be useful to make the connection from a computer to the TV wireless, the same as a cable.
author: Dave Calabro

review: This is yet another simple and great product by Google. So easy to use and works so well. No need to upgrade TV for Smart TV or buy expensive Blue Ray players. Thank you Google
author: viswanath Garlapati

review: Just plug it in, follow the prompts to install, and instantly watch all your favorite TV shows/Movies/Videos on your TV! Amazing! Best purchase I made all year!
author: Celine Villongco

review: Do not purchase a smart tv, purchase a chromecast! Cheaper and better! Very very very  easy to install and use!
author: O. Salas
